        // æ¼”ç¤ºå°å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶åˆ°æœ¬åœ°

        easyExcelPoint.setUseAnnotation(false);// ä¸ä½¿ç”¨è¨»è§£å°å‡º

        exportFieldCommands.add(new ExportFieldCommand("data.$url","åœ°å€"));
        exportFieldCommands.add(new ExportFieldCommand("data.$summary","æè¿°"));
        exportFieldCommands.add(new ExportFieldCommand("data.$language","èªè¨€"));
        exportFieldCommands.add(new ExportFieldCommand("data.$category","é¡å‹"));

        // è¨­ç½®å°å‡ºæ•¸æ“šä¿¡æ¯

        // è²æ˜å°å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶åœ°å€

public static void main(String[] args) {

    System.out.println("æ‚¨æƒ³å•ä»€éº¼ï¼Ÿ");
    Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
    String userInput = scanner.nextLine();

    while (userInput != null) {

        prompt.addMessage(new HumanMessage(userInput));

        llm.chatStream(prompt, (context, response) -> {
            System.out.println(">>>> " + response.getMessage().getContent());
        });

        userInput = scanner.nextLine();
    }
}
